title: Rocket League sales revenue worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
There is a difference of 40.0 between the maximum Month June 2016 and minimum Month December 2015.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
There is a difference of 40.0 between the maximum Month June 2016 and minimum Month December 2015.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
Month June 2016 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and December 2015 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Month June 2016 has 40.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month December 2015.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars has lowered over the past 2 Months.
The highest value 110.0 at June 2016 is almost 1.22 times larger than the average value 90.0.
